page.title: 17Banking Facilities Tongue
page.content: A Bank customer in Tongue is no worse off than a customer maintaining an account with a large office. If any thing the small branch customer will receive a more personal service where nearly all customers are known by name The services are exactly the same but they are provided to a much wider area involving the use of sub-branches and, in some cases, travelling banks.In a scattered community the Bank view is that if the customer cannot get to the Bank then the Bank will get to the customer.Staff in a large office tend to become specialists but in a small office,areas of work such as Standing Order clerk or Foreign Currency clerk and others, are covered by one member of staff.As a result the staff are more adaptable and consequently may be more satisfied in their work.
